title: Manage a Live TV Call-In Segment
description: A producer for a live TV news show must screen callers for a call-in segment with a political analyst.

tasks.expected_outcome: The producer is connected to a viewer.

tasks.description: Briefly speak with the caller to understand their question and vet them for clarity and appropriateness.
tasks.expected_outcome: The producer screens the caller and their question.

tasks.description: Place the best callers in a queue to be put on the air.
tasks.expected_outcome: A queue of vetted callers is ready for the host.
